title: Timer for android wear
summary: Wear Timer for android smart watch
description: Wear Timer is a simple to use app for android wear smart watch; useful in many timing scenarios.-------------------------------Actions-------------------------------Set timerStartStopRestartResetSet Alert-------------------------------Features-------------------------------Until 100 hoursRun in backgroundCyclic mode:  On/OffLeft time graphic:  On/OffAlert mode:  Mute/Vibrate/Beep/Vibrate and Beep                     Beep if device has speaker capabilitiesSet Alert patterns-------------------------------Languages-------------------------------English中国FrançaisDeutschItaliano日本人한국의PortuguêsPусскийEspañol
descriptionHTML:
Wear Timer is a simple to use app for android wear smart watch; useful in many timing scenarios.

-------------------------------
Actions
-------------------------------
Set timer
Start
Stop
Restart
Reset
Set Alert

-------------------------------
Features
-------------------------------
Until 100 hours
Run in background
Cyclic mode: On/Off
Left time graphic: On/Off
Alert mode: Mute/Vibrate/Beep/Vibrate and Beep
Beep if device has speaker capabilities
Set Alert patterns

-------------------------------
Languages
-------------------------------
English
中国
Français
Deutsch
Italiano
日本人
한국의
Português
Pусский
Español
comments: Didn't work on my Asus Zen 1. Watch didn't vibrate when the timer went off. 2. Screen doesn't turn off. 3. The app isn't optimized with the touch screen.
